name: Anterior anterior basal lobe
function: Higher motor control (movement of head, arms and eyes)

name: Interbasal lobes
function: Higher motor control (movement of feeding tentacles)

name: Median basal lobe
function: Higher motor control (movement of mantle and funnel during swimming and breathing, movement of fins, chromatophores and buccal mass)

name: Lateral basal lobes
function: Higher motor control (control of chromatophores and papillae)

name: Anterior pedal lobe
function: Intermediate motor control (movement of arms and tentacles)

name: Posterior pedal lobe
function: Lower motor control (movement of funnel, fins and tentacles; head retraction)

name: Anterior dorsal chromatophore lobes
function: Lower motor control (chromatophores & papillae on head and arms)

name: Anterior ventral chromatophore lobes
function: Lower motor control (chromatophores & papillae on head and arms)

name: Palliovisceral lobe
function: Lower motor control (escape movements and ink ejection)

name: Posterior chromatophore lobes
function: Lower motor control (chromatophores & papillae on mantle, fin and visceral mass)

name: Optic to anterior basal lobe tracts
Lateral basal to posterior chromatophore lobe tracts
Pallial nerves
function: Innervates the muscles and skin of the mantle

name: Optic to dorsal magnocellular lobe tracts
Collar nerves
function: Innervates the collar muscles and valves of the mantle

name: Visceral nerves
function: Innervates retractor muscles of the head and funnel

name: Head retractor nerves
function: Innervates the muscles that connect the head to the mantle
